name: Mitchel Camacho
label: Student passionate about all things fintech
summary: Hi! My name is Mitchel Camacho, and I am a student at the University of Hawaii at Manoa pursuing a degree in Finance and Management Information Systems.

projects.title: Fantasy Performance Analyzer For NBA Players
projects.summary: A Python application that analyzes NBA player performance data to help make informed decisions for fantasy draft picks.
highlights: Python, Pandas, MatPlotlib, Seaborn, Data Visualization, Data Analysis, & Data Cleaning

Conducted exploratory data analysis on publicly available datasets, examining the effects of vaccination (or lack thereof) on public health through variables like case counts, infection rates, and vaccination status to uncover meaningful insights.

Leveraged AI tools such as ChatGPT and Claude to guide data discovery, generate research prompts, and support the creation of visualizations, dashboards, and reports on the effects of having a vaccinated population.
